input.sentences: my family went on our vacation to a museum filled with amazing artwork .
the buildings at the museum were all designed differently .
inside the museum we found some interesting butterfly art .
we saw this impressive glass display outside one of the buildings .
we also saw a structure that was in the process of being built as we were leaving .
output.sentences: While we were on vacation we visited the local art museum.
There were so many beautiful sights to see both indoors and out.
My favorite display was beautiful butterflies.
My husband's favorite thing to see at the museum were the planes outdoors.
As we were leaving we saw a large strange sculpture outside.
